Articles.Content:
Since the [new Sketchfab feature](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123480-Proper-3D-screenshots-where-you-can-rotate-crafts-now-available!) arrived I've been wondering if it would be possible to export the model into, say, 3DS Max so we could do some nice renders. I've tried to do it using other means with moderate success 

> ![nSVsnMH.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/nSVsnMH.jpg)

>  but having a program/plugin to do all the work would be really great. It's possible to rip borrow it directly from Sketchfab with some work but I would be grateful for a better solution.
There's a tool for importing .craft files into Blender, you can find it [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111483).
Thanks a lot, exactly what I was looking for. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
